FuncDef: This command updates the data of the IPoE session identified with the given MAC address and SAP identifier. Optionally the remote ID and circuit ID can be specified to identify the IPoE session to update.
CLIs: edit-ipoe-session sap <sap-id> mac <mac-address> [ subscriber <sub-ident-string> ] [ sub-profile-string <sub-profile-string> ] [ sla-profile-string <sla-profile-string> ] [ inter-dest-id <intermediate-destination-id> ] [ ancp-string <ancp-string> ] [ app-profile-string <app-profile-string> ] [ circuit-id <circuit-id> ] [ remote-id <remote-id> ]
